3: Is the purification target still alive and well, Bianca?
Just this moment, Commander Nikola gave me direct orders.
To have my squad provide support.
For one, to lower the possible losses. And two...
To determine if the target is a potential threat. And if it is, then we will perform purification.
If you go back on your word...
Can't help it, dear. They're orders from the top, I can't go against that. Of course, your little ticket is still in effect, so I won't be doing it myself directly.
Answer my question, Bianca, is the target still alive?
